    • Method Detail

      • getModulationValue

        public static int getModulationValue(java.lang.String modulation)
        Convert a string describing a modulation into an integer value that can be used with GollumDongle methods

        Possible values are :

        "ASK/OOK": 48

        "2-FSK": 0

        "4-FSK: 64

        "GFSK": 16

        "MSK": 112

        Parameters:
        modulation - as a String
        Returns:
        modulation value from a string

      • getModulationName

        public static java.lang.String getModulationName(int modulation)
        Convert an integer describing a modulation into a textual String value

        Possible values are :

        "ASK/OOK": 48

        "2-FSK": 0

        "4-FSK: 64

        "GFSK": 16

        "MSK": 112

        Parameters:
        modulation - as an integer
        Returns:
        modulation in String format
